Title: Vadhaka
Plot: When Vadhaka attacks Logan and Min, she tells him the statue belongs to Hideki Kurohagi and is the spirit of Madripoor, but the statue can't move unless the seal was removed. As they run, a crazed mob attacks and Logan directs them to a dead end alley way. Logan tries to protect Min, only for a rival group to attack the ones that chased the two. As soon as they flee the mobs, the statue intercepts them with Logan using his unbreakable skeleton to shield Min from Vadhaka's fists. Logan brings out
GuestStars: Rikiya Koyama, Romi Park, Fumiko Orikasa, Hidekatsu Shibata, Kazuki Yao, Masato Hagiwara, Masaki Terasoma, Ry?zabur? ?tomo, Toshiyuki Morikawa
